overview: All the highlights from the legendary cyclist's astonishing series of Tour de France victories, from 1999 to 2005. Not only is Lance Armstrong one of the best cyclists in Tour de France history, but his series of wins have been achieved against all the odds after he was diagnosed with testicular cancer and given only a 60 percent chance of recovery.
tagline: The official Tour de France story of Lance Armstrong's superhuman seven victories in a row
title: Lance Armstrong - 7 In A Row
